p: Aiming to evaluate toxic effects of the essential oils of some Hyptidinae species, three samples were tested in the toxicity assay against Artemia salina. The results showed significant toxicity with median lethal concentration (LC 50) values of 62.2 ± 3.07 μg/mL, 65.9 ± 6.55 μg/mL and 60.8 ± 9.04 μg/mL to Mesosphaerum suaveolens (syn. Hyptis suaveolens), Hyptis rhomboidea and Hyptis brevipes essential oils, respectively ( Xu et al., 2013).
